sentences.en: Also, don't discount the appropriateness of silence.
sentences.cn: 而且不要忽视适当的沉默。

sentences.en: Programming appropriateness is different from abstract equivalence, though.
sentences.cn: 然而，编写合适的程序不同于抽象的对等。

sentences.en: As to the appropriateness of his behavior, worry about your own conduct and leave him alone.
sentences.cn: 至于他的行为的合适性，你只需要管好你自己，随他去吧。
